body.name: 4X Strong Magnetic Shelf for Stove Top, Adjustable 15-30 in, Fits Various Stove Lengths, Kitchen Organizer, Holds Spices, Matte Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Adjustable Length Fits Different Size Cooktops: This stove top rack has an adjustable length from 15-30 inches, allowing it to freely fit different sized cooktops. It is very versatile for cooktops of various styles.

Four Powerful Magnetic Pads for Easy One-touch Use: The bottom is equipped with 4 strong magnetic pads. Simply place it on the cooktop and it will firmly stick without any complex installation steps. True one-touch ease of use.
Easy Clean Smooth Appearance: Made from durable heat-resistant metal, the smooth surface is easy to clean. The clean sleek look will not clutter your kitchen aesthetics.
Anti-tip Design: The non-slip matte surface plus edges prevent spices, sauces and other kitchen items from sliding or bumping and damaging your cooktop.
High Quality Assurance: Made from high quality metal, the frame is sturdy and durable to ensure product quality and provide customers a superior usage experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Model Number: SS505701 Efficient Kitchen Organization Solutions. Adjustable Length, Fits Various Stovetops: This stovetop rack features an adjustable length of 15 inches to 30 inches, allowing it to accommodate different stovetop sizes. It's widely compatible with various types of stovetops, making it incredibly practical. 4x Strong Magnetic Attraction, Easy to Use: The bottom of the product is equipped with 4 strong magnets, ensuring a secure attachment to your stovetop with just a simple placement. No complicated installation steps are required, making it a true "place and use" product. Space-saving, easy to clean and sleek design: Made of durable materials with a minimalist build, it helps maximize your countertop space. The smooth surface is easy to clean. Its simple yet stylish look blends seamlessly with any kitchen decor. Anti-Tipping Design: The rack's surface features a matte finish to increase friction, and the anti-tipping design on the edges effectively prevents spices, sauces, and other kitchen items from sliding or causing damage to your stovetop. High-Quality: Crafted from high-quality metal, this sturdy and stable stovetop rack is built to last. Its durability ensures product quality, providing customers with a superior user experience. Compatible Brands: Kenmore/JennAir/Samsung/LG/Electrolux/Dacor/Wolf/Sub-Zero/American Range/BlueStar/Capital/Fisher & Paykel/Amana/Bertazzoni/Blomberg/Café/Fulgor Milano/Garland/Heartland/Ilve/La Cornue/Miele

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect addition to any kitchen!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a shelf to place above my stove for my most frequently used kitchen items and this was the ideal option. This adjustable shelve fits seamlessly on the top of the stove and is very sturdy. Although it is magnetic, there is also the option to screw it as well if you wanted. I like the design of the raised front which allows everything to stay in place without sliding off. It took less than a minute to set up and frees up valuable counter space. Very functional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SZJHXIN 4X Strong Magnetic Stovetop Shelf
reviews.reviewText: The SZJHXIN 4X Strong Magnetic Stovetop Shelf is awesome! Not only is the shelf magnetic, it is sturdy, adjustable and provides adequate room for spices, etc. plus tea at an affordable price. There were no instructions included, but installation is simple and straightforward. It looks great and I’m so glad I decided to purchase the shelf because it also frees up counter space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I almost cancelled the order when I realized that my stove wasn’t flat on the top, but I’m glad I didn’t! Because the shelf is an adjustable length with two pieces that slide together, I was able to extend the shelf enough for it to bend downward just a little at each end and still stick very well to the top. I did have to do extra adjusting to make sure the back of the shelf was flush to the wall so that it couldn’t move as much, but it wasn’t a problem and only took a few minutes. I think some extra sticky pieces I received might be to hang the shelf less permanently on the wall instead, as well since there were holes where it could be hung on the wall traditionally. It’s long enough that I could have it hanging off a couple inches on either side if I wanted, so it’s pretty big! As the picture shows, it holds a lot of spices in all different sizes, even my large salt cellar. The metal is thin enough to be lightweight, but thick enough not to easily bend, so I’d say it’s fairly sturdy material. I feel it was well worth what I paid!The only downside I see is that the magnets have a peel-off back and are meant to be stuck to the stove. My partner and I may be moving soon, which means the magnets will likely need to be replaced, and I like the firm stick the magnets give over the idea of sticking it to the wall because of the weight. I may try to take them off and stick them on wax paper to see if they’ll work after being moved, but if that doesn’t work, I’ll be a little bummed to have to buy more magnet strips to stick down. Still highly recommend this product though!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas she loved it and it looks great on top of her stove. Has magnetic and it fits perfectly to hold all of her extra spices, salt and peppers. Definitely a recommendation to purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really made my stovetop complete
reviews.reviewText: What took me so long to figure out this is the perfect addition to my stove shelf? Now I have a place for my cute hand made salt and pepper shakers, as well as my timer and salt pig! Love the sturdiness, great magnets to hold it tight, easy fitting it on. Good buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this item because it keeps spices on the back of the stove without them falling off the sides or the front. And my husband hasn't destroyed it so I'd say it's not only handy but sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Its ok for now
reviews.reviewText: The magnets are strong but both the magnets and adhesive isn't strong enough to make a firm grip on the wall or stove. Right now it is only holding my olive oil and a few spices I use often. I will update if it hold or fall, right now it looks like it is in danger of falling behind the stove

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: This item is sturdy and makes small spaces easy to be in with the option for additional storage
